name: Little bro-bizzare adventure
description:
this is my first time developing a game so you may find it a bit cliched and this beta  not the full version this game is normal platformer game I haven't decided a story for the game yet, I'll work on the story later

system requirements:

It will work on any device no matter how weak it is and It works on 32 bit devices too Don't worry I'm thinking of people who have weak devices

music from here:
